snippet: The way that the news of the passing of the father of Kansas City Royals pitcher Edinson Volquez was handled highlighted the age-old awkwardness and discomfort that surround the notification of a death.

byline.contributor: Michael Cooper, Michael Paulson and David Waldstein contributed reporting.

abstract: Kansas City Royals management and Fox broadcasting network, at the request of pitcher Edinson Volquez's family, withheld news that Volquez's father had passed away until after he threw his last pitch in Game 1 of World Series against New York Mets; incident highlights challenge of when to inform someone of death.
lead_paragraph: The way that the news of the passing of the father of Kansas City Royals pitcher Edinson Volquez was handled highlighted the age-old awkwardness and discomfort that surround the notification of a death.

headline.print_headline: As Volquez Battled, Royals Faced Tough Situation
headline.main: As Edinson Volquez Battled, Royals Faced a Tough Situation
